quote: When Noah woke up from his wine and learned what his youngest son had done to him,

This was so that the violence done to the 70 sons of Jer·ub·baʹal might be avenged, so as to place responsibility for their blood on their brother A·bimʹe·lech for killing them and on the leaders of Sheʹchem for helping him to kill his brothers.
For whoever wants to save his life will lose it, but whoever loses his life for my sake is the one who will save it.
